name: The Outhouse (NadanDev)
description:
This is my first full game. Please enjoy and leave feedback!

Story: You are camping deep in the forest at a secluded camp site with nothing but a spooky outhouse. You later find that going so deep in the forest wasn't a very good idea...

Controls

Movement - WASD

Interact - E

Continue/speed up dialogue - F

Flashlight - T

Pause - ESC

Hide - Q
